Japanese: なんて事…… この時代まで……。
English: This is so depressing. No era is safe, and there isn't much of a future to look forward to.
Retranslation: It can't be...... This era too......

Japanese: こわかった…… いしきがないのに、冷たい所にいるのが わかるの。
English: It was awful... I can't recall it all... I was somewhere cold, dark...and lonely. Is that what it's like to...die?
Retranslation: I was scared...... Even though I'm not conscious, knowing I'm in a cold place.....

Japanese: はやいだけってのもね……。
English: Someone ought to tell him to take a permanent pit stop. Look at that hair!
Retranslation: All he is is fast, too......

Japanese: そ、そうだよ！ 変えちゃおう！　クロノが 私を助けてくれたみたいに！
English: There's only one thing we can do! We must change history! Just like Crono did when he saved me!
Retranslation: That, that's it! Let's go ahead and change it! Like when Crono saved me!

Japanese: どもども、中プウだケロ。 ワールドマップのちびキャラいたケロ。 ルッカは本を読んでるケロ。 クロノは急がせてるケロ。わかるケロ？
Retranslation: Thank you, thank you, (?), ribbit. There's chibi characters on the world map, ribbit. Lucca reads a book, ribbit. Crono urges you on, ribbit. Know that, ribbit?
